title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 1, ch. II, subch. A, pt. 68 - Captive Cervid Health Requirements
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 1, ch. II, subch. A, pt. 68 - Captive Cervid Health Requirements

State Regulations
§ 68.1 - Definitions
§ 68.2 - General health requirements for captive cervids
§ 68.3 - Special provisions for captive cervids susceptible to chronic wasting disease
§ 68.4 - Cwd certified herd program
§ 68.5 - CWD Monitored Herd Program
§ 68.6 - Approved cwd susceptible cervid slaughter facility
§ 68.7 - Management of CWD positive, exposed or suspect herds
§ 68.8 - Repealed

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 1, ch. II, subch. A, pt. 68

Statutory authority: Agriculture and Markets Law, §§ 18[6], 72, 74

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
